title: Max Startup is Rocketing
excerpt: From concept to seed funding in 6 months.
fullDescription: Max joined TechLabs with a background in business but no technical skills. Through the Web Development track, he learned to build his own MVP and validate his startup idea. Within 6 months of graduating, he secured seed funding and now leads a team of 5 developers.

title: Lia just landed her first client
excerpt: Freelance success after the DS track.
fullDescription: Lia was a marketing professional looking to transition into data science. The Data Science track at TechLabs gave her the practical skills and portfolio she needed. She now works as a freelance data analyst, helping startups make data-driven decisions.
achievements: First client within 2 weeks of graduation

title: Anna is now in the head of Tech
fullDescription: Anna came to TechLabs as a junior developer looking to advance her career. The comprehensive curriculum and mentorship helped her develop both technical and leadership skills. She's now Head of Technology at a growing fintech company.
achievements: Promoted from Junior to Lead in 8 months

title: Sarah's AI breakthrough
fullDescription: Sarah was a high school teacher with a passion for technology. The AI track at TechLabs opened up a completely new career path. She now works as an AI researcher, developing educational technology solutions.

title: Marcus designs the future
fullDescription: Marcus had a background in graphic design but wanted to move into digital product design. The Product Design track at TechLabs provided him with UX/UI skills and a strong portfolio. He now leads design at a successful startup.

title: Julia's data science journey
fullDescription: Julia worked in traditional finance but wanted to leverage her analytical skills in the tech world. The Data Science track at TechLabs gave her the technical foundation she needed. She now works as a senior data scientist.
achievements: Increased company revenue by 25% through insights
